## Part 1

```{r}
#| label: part1

tibble(
  race = 1:3,
  duration = c(7, 15, 30),
  to_beat = c(9, 40, 200)) -> test
tibble(
  race = 1:4,  
  duration = c(44, 80, 65, 72),
  to_beat = c(208, 1581, 1050, 1102)) |> 
  mutate(wait = map(duration, \(x) 0:x)) |> 
  unnest(wait) |>
  mutate(distance = wait * (duration - wait)) |> 
  summarise(n = sum(distance > to_beat), .by = race) |> 
  summarise(prod(n))



```
